theme.title: Xune+Pwste
theme.friendly_accent: Paszamine va rangé taëkidi dastguhé xod ru har jwr ke mixuhid tagcyir dahid.
theme.friendly_tiles: Scoma mitavunid anduze va teëdudé kuscihuyé mójwd dar safheyé asliyetun ru tagcyir dahid.

screen_rotation.title: Carxescé Safhe
screen_rotation.friendly_rotation_lock: Hengumi ke qoflé carxesc róscan buscad, gwsciyé scomu dar hamin jahatgiresc xuhad mund agar un ru becarxunid.

ease_of_access.title: Usuniyé Dastresi
ease_of_access.description: anduzeyé matn, kontrusté bulu, va bischtar

reset.title: Launcheré Groove buznescuni scavad?
reset.message: In monjar be buznescuni scodané launcher be tanzimuté piscfarz xuhad scod. Hameyé sefurescisuzihu az dast xuhand raft.

root.title: Dastresiyé root niyuz ast
root.message: Dastresiyé root baruyé anjumé in konesc vojwd durad. Lotfan baruyé edume dastresiyé root ru suder konid.

shizuku.title: Dastresiyé shizuku niyuz ast
shizuku.message: Dastresiyé shizuku baruyé anjumé in konesc vojwd durad. Lotfan baruyé edume dastresiyé shizuku ru suder konid.

update_available.title: Berwzresuni mójwd ast!
update_available.message: Yek nosxeyé jadid ({{version}}) bu hajmé {{size}} mójwd aast. Uyu mixuhid burgiri konidasc?
update_available.message2: Yek nosxeyé jadid ({{version}}) mójwd ast. Uyu mixuhid burgiri konidasc?

update_check_failed.title: Barresiyé Berwzresuni Anjum Nascod!
update_check_failed.message: Emkune barresiyé berwzresunihuyé barnumehu vojwd nadurad. Lotfan baëdan dobure talusc konid.

up_to_date.title: Be Rwz!
up_to_date.message: Scomu Groovitarin nosxeyé Launcheré Groove ru durid.

font_read_error.title: Qulebé fuylé posctibuni nascode
font_read_error.message: Font moëtabar ni'st. Motmaen scavid ke in yek fuylé .ttf ast va sepas dobure talusc konid.

font_load_error.title: Nemitavun font ru burgozuri kard
font_load_error.message: Mu natavunestim fuylé font ru bexunim. Faqat fonthuyé .ttf posctibuni miscavand. Lotfan bu fuylé motefuveti talusc konid.

copy_failed.title: Kopi anjum nascod!
copy_failed.message: Emkuné kopiyé fehresté barnumehu vojwd nadurad. Lotfan dobure talusc konid.

copy_success.title: Dar boridedun kopi scod!
copy_success.message: Barnumehuyé nasb scode bu movaffaqiyat be qulebé JSON kopi scodand.
